channel.title: Traitor King Neutral Special
channel.description:
Good king (60%), Evil King (20%) Traitor King (20%) Passives(1)Tenacity - Immune to most occupation and Redirection Day ability(1)Royal Finger - Next vote will count twice. (Infinite) Day Ability(2)Decide fait - Decide fait of someone on Trail. (1 Use) Night ability(1) Guards! - Send guards to protect you (2 Uses) Night ability(2) Slander! - Reverse the results on someone, Makes them immune Bd = unseen/Cult Neutral/unseen/Cult = Bd.) (4 Uses) [Starting only]
Goal: Defeat the Blue dragon
Sellsword becomes Traitor King with no slander. Also minor SS change would be they win with evils but a evil has to win.

item.title: Traitor King Neutral Special
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
Not sure about making this a potential starting king.

It would play almost the exact same as EK minus checks.

I do like making ss transition to essentially ek though.

Read full topic

Also minor SS change would be they win with evils but a evil has to win.
